tuv.seg: Detention of a child who is convicted of a crime is considered a last resort
Is é an rogha deiridh leanbh atá ciontaithe i gcoir a choinneáil faoi choimeád
As an alternative to detention, the Children Act 2001 provides for a range of community sanctions that can be imposed by a court
Déanann Acht na Leanaí 2001 foráil i gcomhair réimse smachtbhannaí pobail gur féidir le cúirt a chur i bhfeidhm mar rogha eile ar choinneáil
The court must consider that a community sanction is the most suitable way of dealing with the case
Ní mór don chúirt a mheas gur smachtbhanna pobail an bealach is feiliúnaí chun an cás a láimhseáil
These sanctions allow a child to remain in the community and stay at school
Ligeann na smachtbhannaí seo do leanbh fanacht sa phobal agus fanacht ar scoil
The Young Persons Probation division of the Probation Service oversees the implementation of most of the community sanctions
Déanann rannóg Phromhadh na nDaoine Óga den tSeirbhís Promhaidh maoirsiú ar chur i bhfeidhm fhormhór na smachtbhannaí pobail
If a child does not comply with a community sanction that has been imposed the case is returned to the court
Mura gcloíonn leanbh le smachtanna pobail a chuirtear i bhfeidhm, tugtar an cás ar ais os comhair na cúirte
Apart from a community service order, all community sanction orders expire 6 months after the child has reached 18 years of age, if they have not already done so
Téann gach ordú smachtbhanna pobail, seachas ordú seirbhíse pobail, in éag 6 mhí tar éis don leanbh 18 bliana d’aois a shroichint, mura bhfuil siad imithe in éag cheana féin
There are 10 community sanctions available to the courts
Tá 10 smachtbhanna pobail ar fáil do na cúirteanna
Under a community service order a child aged 16 or 17 completes a set number of hours of unpaid work
Faoi ordú seirbhíse pobail, déanann leanbh atá 16 nó 17 mbliana d’aois méid áirithe uaireanta oibre nach bhfaigheann siad íocaíocht orthu
The number of hours can range from 40 – 240 hours
Is féidir líon uaireanta idir 40 - 240 a bheith i gceist anseo
A day centre order requires a child to attend a day centre and participate in a programme of activities
Ceanglaíonn ordú ionaid lae ar leanbh freastal ar ionad lae agus páirt a ghlacadh i gclár imeachtaí
Attendance at the centre is for a maximum of 90 days
Bíonn uasthréimhse de 90 lá i gceist le freastal ar an ionad
The days need not be consecutive, but attendance cannot exceed a period of 6 months
Ní gá do na laethanta a bheith comhleantach, ach ní féidir le freastal dul thar thréimhse 6 mhí
Generally, the programme is available in the evenings and on weekends so as not to interfere with school, training or employment
Is iondúil go mbíonn an clár ar siúl sa tráthnóna agus ar dheirí seachtaine ionas nach gcuirfidh sé isteach ar an scoil, ar oiliúint ná ar fhostaíocht
A probation order places a child under the supervision of the Probation Service for a period of time
Cuireann ordú promhaidh leanbh faoi mhaoirsiú na Seirbhíse Promhaidh ar feadh tréimhse ama
During the period the child must meet certain conditions that are set by the court
I rith na tréimhse sin, ní mór don leanbh coinníollacha áirithe atá leagtha síos ag an gcúirt a chomhlíonadh
• To be of good behaviour
• Iad féin a iompar go maith
• To follow the instructions of the supervising probation officer
• Treoracha an oifigigh promhaidh atá á maoirsiú a leanúint
Additional conditions may include paticipation in a training course or activity and residence in a hostel
D’fhéadfadh rannpháirtíocht i gcúrsa oiliúna nó i ngníomhaíocht agus cónaí i mbrú a bheith i measc na gcoinníollacha eile
Training or activities programme order
Ordú cláir oiliúna nó gníomhaíochtaí
This is a type of probation order where the child has to complete a programme of training or activity recommended by a probation officer
Is cineál ordú promhaidh é seo inar gá don leanbh clár oiliúna nó gníomhaíocht a mholann oifigeach promhaidh a chomhlíonadh
The programme may be managed by the Probation Service or some other body
D’fhéadfadh an clár seo a bheith á bhainistiú ag an tSeirbhís Promhaidh nó ag comhlacht éigin eile
It does not necessarily cater exclusively for children found guilty of offences
Ní gá gur ar leanaí a fuarthas ciontach i gcionta amháin a fhreastalaíonn sé
Under an intensive supervision order a child is placed under the close supervision of a probation officer
Faoi ordú dian-mhaoirsithe, cuirtear leanbh faoi dhian-mhaoirsiú ag oifigeach promhaidh
During the period of the order the child is required to live at a specified residence and attend a programme of education, training or treatment
I rith tréimhse an ordaithe, ní mór don leanbh maireachtáil in áitreabh ar leith agus freastal ar chlár oideachais, oiliúna nó cóireála
The order cannot exceed 180 days
Ní féidir leis an ordú seo dul thar 180 lá
If the order is over 90 days it is subject to review after 60 days
Má tá an t-ordú os cionn 90 lá, tá sé faoi réir athbhreithnithe tar éis 60 lá
The programme may be managed by the Probation Service or some other body
D’fhéadfadh an clár seo a bheith á bhainistiú ag an tSeirbhís Promhaidh nó ag comhlacht éigin eile
It does not necessarily cater exclusively for children found guilty of offences
Ní gá gur ar leanaí a fuarthas ciontach i gcionta amháin a fhreastalaíonn sé
A court can order that a child lives in a hostel
Is féidir leis an gcúirt ordú go mairfidh leanbh i mbrú
The hostel would be reasonably close to where the child usually lives or to where they go to school, work or attend training
Bheadh an brú réasúnta gar don áit ina mbíonn cónaí ar an leanbh go hiondúil, nó don áit a dtéann sé/sí ar scoil, ag obair nó i mbun oiliúna
The period of the order cannot exceed one year
Ní féidir le tréimhse an ordaithe dul thar bhliain amháin
Suitable person (care and supervision) order
Ordú dhuine feiliúnach (cúram agus maoirsiú)
Under a suitable person order the court places a child into the care of a suitable adult
Faoi ordú dhuine feiliúnach, cuireann an chúirt leanbh i gcúram duine fásta feiliúnach
The suitable person can be a relative
Is féidir gaol a ainmniú mar dhuine feiliúnach
The child’s parents must give their consent in writing
Ní mór do thuismitheoirí an linbh a dtoiliú a thabhairt i scríbhinn
The period of the order cannot exceed 2 years
Ní féidir le tréimhse an ordaithe dul thar 2 bhliain
Mentor (family support) order
Ordú Meantóra (tacaíocht don teaghlach)
A court can assign someone, a mentor, to help, advise and support the child and the child’s family in the family’s efforts to try and stop the child from committing further offences

Is féidir le cúirt duine éigin, meantóir a shannadh chun cabhrú leis na leanbh agus le teaghlach an linbh, chun comhairle a chur orthu agus chun tacú leo ina n-iarrachtaí chun an leanbh a stopadh ó chionta eile a dhéanamh
The mentor also monitors the child’s behaviour generally
Déanann an meantóir monatóireacht ar iompar an linbh go ginearálta freisin
The child and the parents must give their consent and the period of the order cannot not exceed 2 years
Ní mór don leanbh agus dá t(h)uismitheoirí a dtoiliú a thabhairt agus ní féidir le tréimhse an ordaithe dul thar 2 bhliain
A restriction on movement order is a curfew order supervised by the Gardaí
Is éard atá in ordú sriain ar ghluaiseacht ná ordú cuirfiú atá á mhaoirsiú ag na Gardaí
The child is required to be at a certain address between 7pm and 6am
Ní mór don leanbh a bheith ag seoladh áirithe idir 7in agus 6rn
The maximum period of time the curfew can be imposed for is 6 months
Is é an tréimhse is faide dár féidir an cuirfiú a chur i bhfeidhm ná 6 mhí
Instead of the curfew or as well as the curfew, the order can include a condition to stay away from a specified area
In áit an chuirfiú nó in éineacht leis an gcuirfiú, is féidir coinníoll a bheith san áireamh san ordú fanacht amach ó cheantar ar leith
The maximum period of time for this condition is 12 months
Is í an tréimhse ama is faide dár féidir an coinníoll seo a chur i bhfeidhm ná 12 mhí
A dual order combines a restriction of movement order with either a day centre order or a probation order
Bíonn ordú srianta ar ghluaiseacht in éineacht le hordú ionaid lae nó ordú promhaidh i gceist in ordú dúbailte
The child’s movements are restricted for a maximum of 6 months
Bíonn srian ar ghluaiseachtaí an linbh ar feadh tréimhse nach faide ná 6 mhí
At the same time, the child attends a day centre for a maximum of 90 days or is under the supervision of a probation officer
Ag an am céanna, freastalaíonn an leanbh ar ionad lae ar feadh 90 lá ar a mhéid, nó bíonn sé/sí faoi mhaoirsiú oifigigh promhaidh
